Introduction

AFOTS (short for A Fragment of the Season) is a South Korean virtual duo under SCON Entertainment. They made their debut on August 22, 2024.

Originally a four-member group, it was announced on December 27, 2024 that members Sehan and Juwun would be leaving on the 31st. The two revealed that they had decided to terminate their contracts and would go their separate ways.

The two remaining members, Dohwi and Luvin, still under SCON Entertainment, are currently pursuing individual activities on their own live broadcast channels.
